mutants.code:
import re

def extractJavaScript(html):
    script_tags = re.findall('', html, re.DOTALL)
    filtered_scripts = [script for script in script_tags if '@push' not in script]
    return filtered_scripts

import re

def extractJavaScript(html):
    script_tags = re.findall('<script>(.*?)</script>', html, re.DOTALL)
    filtered_scripts = [script for script in script_tags if '@push' in script]
    return filtered_scripts

mutants.mutated_line: filtered_scripts = [script for script in script_tags if '' not in script]
mutants.code:
import re

def extractJavaScript(html):
    script_tags = re.findall('<script>(.*?)</script>', html, re.DOTALL)
    filtered_scripts = [script for script in script_tags if '' not in script]
    return filtered_scripts
